## Ans 1

```{r}
## circular area

circlearea <- function(radius) {
    print(pi * radius^2)
}

## or

    print(pi * radius^2)
}
```

## Ans 3

```{r}
cumulative <- function(v) {
    sum <- 0
    
    for(i in 1:length(v)) {
        sum <- sum + v[i]
        print(sum)
    }
}

## equivalent built-in R function
cumsum(1:10)
```

## Ans 4

```{r}
printi <- function() {
    i <- 1
    
    while(i <= 10) {
        print(i)
        
        i <- i+1
    }
}
```
